name: Crafted_Kismet_D
display_help: Enhances the defense of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Defense.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Defense, Reduces Endurance Cost and Increases Attack Rate
